name: GameDev.net 2017 Whitespace
description: Remove whitespace from the site, and optionally hide the sidebar with a style setting.   Uses the whole window and makes more posts visible on screen at once.
additional_info: If the optional sidebar setting is not supported with your style tool, you can replace /*[[SIDEBAR]]*/ with display: none; For my screen it drops the site from about 3 posts visible to about 5 posts visible. I'm looking at increasing that even more by reducing the user info blocks on every post.
